item.description: I am a PhD candidate in Finance, focusing on commodity markets through the lens of asset pricing and risk management. I hold a Master in Banking and Finance from the University of Paris Nanterre, and have five years of commodity market analysis experience, working for consulting and trading companies. I also have a strong interest in machine learning methods (applied to Finance, natural science and natural language processing) and algorithmic trading (high-frequency / latency). I am a French citizen living in Switzerland.
